section.name: Course Conclusion
section.summary:
Now that you have completed all three units of this IET Fundamentals course, you will check your knowledge by answering the following 10 questions. In order to attain a Certificate of Completion, you will need to answer at least eight of the questions correctly. You have unlimited attempts at this final knowledge check.

This section will serve as a review of course content. By the end of this section, you will be able to:

  • Check your knowledge and attainment of the course learning objectives.
  • Print a certificate of completion upon scoring 80 percent on a 10-question knowledge check.
  • Provide feedback on this course.

After you complete the activities in this section, complete the course evaluation and retrieve your certificate.
